content: Orange's action against Purple was solely meant to counter a direct threat on our border. We aim for regional stability and have no further territorial ambitions at this time.
Orange's actions are limited to Purple and pose no threat to Red. We propose coordinating our territorial interests to avoid future clashes - perhaps in lands to your west?

action: Occupy border city of attacked nation
